meanings.sent1: I have a duecento dollar bill.
meanings.sent2: The duecento page book was heavy.
meanings.sent3: The duecento cupcakes at the party were a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her duecento smiles brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The duecento stars in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: A period of time in the 13th century in Italian art and literature.
meanings.sent1: The duecento era was known for its artistic achievements.
meanings.sent2: Many famous paintings were created during the duecento.
meanings.sent3: In the play, the characters traveled back to the duecento.
meanings.sent4: Her love for duecento poetry knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: Studying the duecento period brings history to life.
